event.title: was made to Captain John Evans of the Royal Navy in 1694

data.event: A land grant (patent) of this territory was made to Captain John Evans of the Royal Navy in 1694, and one of his first settlers arrived in 1697.
A land grant (patent) of this territory was made to Captain John Evans of the Royal Navy in 1694, and one of his first settlers arrived in 1697.
The region was part of the Newburgh Precinct and was set apart in 1772.
The Town of Marlborough was formed in 1788 during a period of town formation in the county.
